website_summaries.verdict: A compact interior with comparable features of costlier models make this the best deal for the budget-minded pet owner.
pros: Has a removable stand which makes it easy to clean
Made of solid wrought iron and comes equipped with food and water dishes
cons: One the smaller end, so it won't be comfortable for more than one bird

customer_reviews.title: Great Cage
customer_reviews.text: I have to disagree with some of the bad reviews. This cage is big enough to house two canaries comfortably and with the plastic guard it virtually eliminates the mess that come with keeping birds. Anyone that owns canaries is familiar with the fact that they love to bath daily. Which means they're splishing and splashing every time I change their water. They leave water stains on the walls and windows frequently. With the mess guard my walls (and floors) are free of any water and seeds. It is a hassle taking out the tray and cleaning it every so often but that's a small price to pay considering...
customer_reviews.author: PJMZ28

customer_reviews.title: Better than any other cages I've used by far
customer_reviews.text: Why do I need four bird cages? Simple! Busy birds. Long story short my aviary has grown. I thought I had a cage that I was pleased with but when I tried to order more, they were simply not available. That resulted in my search for another good cage that was easy to clean and prevented my birds from throwing seeds everywhere. I found the Vision cages and now own a small and a large. When the time is right, I'll replace my other two with Vision cages for sure. I would recommend them to friends and family. By the way, my birds include parakeets, canaries and zebra finches.
customer_reviews.author: Edinorlando

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made cage
customer_reviews.text: While putting this cage together. It kept falling apart and wouldn't stay clipped into the base. We finally got it together and put our Parrokeet inside. I was moving one of her perches and the whole thing came apart. Scared our bird like crazy. We ended up putting her back into her old cage. I don't recommend the cage. It's flimsy and my bird could have been hurt when it fell apart.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Cage is nice, my lovebird seems to like it
customer_reviews.text: Cage is nice, my lovebird seems to like it. My cockatoo is interested too. Seems a little smaller than I expected. My lovebird will not use food/water dishes on the bottom, I had to get him some dishes to attach higher up.
customer_reviews.author: D. Vader

customer_reviews.title: the vision product was so amazing that once i got a parakeet
customer_reviews.text: i had bought the medium vision bird cage many months ago when i first got my lovie. the vision product was so amazing that once i got a parakeet, i thought to get a smaller version. initially, it came in perfect & my father & i put it together. it was absolutely perfect for my budgie until one of the clasps that hold the plastic bottom together broke off & the top part of the cage fell in, literally almost squishing my budgie. this was a heinous experience & i won't be buying another vision model.
customer_reviews.author: nikki

customer_reviews.title: Good For Parrotlet
customer_reviews.text: This cage works well for my one small parrotlet. If I had more room I’d buy the next size up as I like birds to have more space to fly. I installed the front upside down so I could put a hanging bath for her. I like having top down doors as well. It’s good at stopping messes but is a bit awkward to clean as the whole top of the cage has to be lifted up. Overall a very good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie

customer_reviews.title: Love this cage for my messy parrotlet !
customer_reviews.text: Aside from having to order this cage 3 times because each time it came cracked due to the careless shipping by UPS, The cage it self is great! I love how my messy parrotlet can't make me a mess around the cage anymore. All the food, feathers, dust and all other messy things stay inside the bottom of the cage. I love the clear plastic around the bottome part. It's the best cage I've seen so far.
customer_reviews.author: Damaris

customer_reviews.title: The end-all be-all bird cage maker!
customer_reviews.text: I can't praise this cage enough! I've already had a Vision medium cage for my lovebirds and have been very impressed by how successfully the design eliminates birdy mess completely. I decided to get a small one for my rescued sparrow to upgrade from his Prevue Hendryx house style cage. This was the first time I had to assemble a Vision cage myself, it was incredibly simple! I think I did it within 10 minutes, everything is snap on. It's quite spacious for my sparrow and he seems very happy! If I get more birds in the future the Vision cages will be the only way to go!
customer_reviews.author: CharmeC

customer_reviews.title: Small Vision Bird Cage
customer_reviews.text: I already have a medium Vision so it took about 10 minutes to 'snap' this jewel together after washing. My two young budgies were fighting and I felt I needed to separate. One is less adverturous so she is in the small Vision purchased. She seems to be happier by herself parked next to her friend in the other cage. Her friend, very confused! Time will tell. I love these cages for containing the mess and prefer the wider vs. taller as birds do not fly upward. The price was right at Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: laney

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Parrotlet Cage
customer_reviews.text: I’ve wanted a parrot for 25 years, and all everyone ever says when I tell them is “parrots are messy.” Thanks to vision cage, not anymore! My little parrotlet is totally cozy in her cage and I love the ease of changing her water and food. My husband put the cage together in 10 minutes flat. We may even purchase a second to become her downstairs cage. The value is unbeatable, and we have a very happy parrot!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Out Fine
customer_reviews.text: This bird cage is fine for one parakeet. I like the fact that the lower section of the cage is enclosed with clear plastic, as seed husks do not fall out and litter the floor so much. I am not keen on the wire floor, though, as I think it is uncomfortable for the bird's feet. I cover it with paper. Actually, I've found that a roll of parchment paper from the grocery store is the most economical way to cover bird cage floors. I just made a pattern for this one, as it is an odd shape, and trace it out on the parchment paper to change out the paper liner.
customer_reviews.author: MacGregor

customer_reviews.title: Good idea but needs improvements......
customer_reviews.text: Good intentions but not for busy people. I love keeping my bird's age clean. But I don't like the idea of no slide out tray and you have to take clips off and remove the whole top of the cage to clean. The cups are divided whereas I would like one for water and one for food only. The plastic seed guard was a good idea but it forces the bird to drop to the bottom to eat. I gave two stars for the price. But for me I will go back to old fashioned cage. In addition not easy to put together either.
customer_reviews.author: InADaze

customer_reviews.title: Great for one-two small birdies. Nice design.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice cage, easy to assemble. Looks great, hopefully it serve for long time too. Lots of plastic parts and connectors have me a bit sceptical, but everything came in perfect condition, no broken parts like some other buyers stated. Perfect for one small bird. Wide plastic part at the top is kind of slippery for the bird to climb in top without help. The only thing, I wish it had a sliding bottom tray, so that I won't have to disattach the bottom part for cleaning (although it attached and disattached very easy). Assembled in 10-15 minutes without any issues. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: LoriS

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy and hard to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy and hard to clean. This was not safe for my budgie. The sides come loose from the base extremely easy. Seems like there's hardware missing but my directions matched what was shipped with the cage. The plastic sides are always getting dirty. I had to clean the sides more then I clean my bathroom mirror and I have teenage sons lol. We threw this cage in the trash after a month and got another wrought iron cage instead. Should have gone with what I trusted already and saved $60. For the same price you can get a nice wrought iron cage twice the size of this cage.
customer_reviews.author: Plucky Artemis

customer_reviews.title: ++++ I like the cage size for my bird
customer_reviews.text: mixed review: ++++ I like the cage size for my bird, the horizontal bars for her to climb, double door that swing in/out, reasonably easy assembly. - after less than 3 weeks, one of the snaps that holds the bottom tray broke. OUCH ! almost useless now. - no handle to facilitate cage carrying/moving. - bottom is a PITA to change paper. no doubt though it helps keep 'stuff' in. but just as hard to clean it out. - for small climbing bird the 'clear plastic skirt' section is too high. my bird has not once gone to floor where feeders are. - had to get separate feeds. final: will replace with something else.
customer_reviews.author: TR

customer_reviews.title: I ADORE this cage! BUT IT IS SO HARD TO PUT TOGETHER
customer_reviews.text: It's worth the pain, but be ready for some pain! I had to have help because I'd get close to done and my pieces would fall apart again. BUT IT'S SO WORTH IT, THE CAGE IS ADORABLE AND VERY GOOD FOR A BUDGIE! It could probably house 2, but I was using it as a temp cage before putting in an aviary.
customer_reviews.author: Nasan

customer_reviews.title: I have a finch and the small is a perfect size. Easy to take apart and clean
customer_reviews.text: I have a finch and the small is a perfect size. Easy to take apart and clean. The plastic bottom does a great job keeping everything in the cage, I never have to clean up around the cage. Love how the doors open both ways and how wide it is when both doors are open. Had a little trouble snapping in the sides when I was putting it together, but after it was assembled it is very sturdy. Best cage I have ever purchased.
customer_reviews.author: cindyr

customer_reviews.title: Great Cage
customer_reviews.text: I've wanted one of these cages for a while now and I was glad I spend the extra money to get it. Although the set up was pretty easy, I did have a few pieces that I have no Idea how to use them or where to put a couple others. The first cleaning I was able to remedy my mistakes and the cage is just fantastic! I did however, replace the perches with wooden doles and my little bird is much happier.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Best cage ever!
customer_reviews.text: Love this cage! My 11 year old grandson assembled this cage in a matter of minutes nearly a year ago. The debris stays in the cage instead of being strewn over the area surrounding the cage. My little bird is about as happy as he knows how to be in there.
customer_reviews.author: philsie123

customer_reviews.title: Can't hang it - I should have looked at this feature more. Will replace cage.
customer_reviews.text: After 1 year i have decided to buy another cage with a hook. I am not sure how much it costs to add a hook on the top of the cage but it's a deal killer for us. A shame. They don't provide a hook and although I have tried different ways to hang it I never feel it is secure enough. It is a good cage but for table top only. I prefer to keep the birds outside sometimes away from animals and since i can't hang it higher I have had 2 attacks on the cage by animals since it is lower.
customer_reviews.author: Albatross

customer_reviews.title: Used cage, but also broken
customer_reviews.text: I don't mind that the cage was used. The box it came in was held together with lots and lots of tape, and looked like someone had chewed on it. What I'm not happy about is that the cage base is broken, and the hinge on one of the food access doors is also broken. We'll see if I can repair the base so I can use it, and I'll have to order a new access door. Yes, the price was good, but there will be unexpected effort involved to make the cage work.
customer_reviews.author: KAM in Castle Rock, CO

customer_reviews.title: An alternative for traveling with small birds
customer_reviews.text: This is supposed to serve as a travel cage, but I’m not confident that it won’t come apart while I’m using it. I wanted a little light cage that was as large as possible, while being very light. I guess that’s mainly true, but I’m not totally happy with the perches & where they have to be located. I needed to hunt to find straps that could attach for easier carrying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good looking well made cage
customer_reviews.text: Love this cage. Definitely well made and the price so good. This cage is very practical for reducing mess and cleaning! The bottom detached part of the best part of all great features! I like to keep my bird and the cage clean and this cage will help me reduce my time cleaning and drying the cage. Will order the large size when baby grow bigger!
customer_reviews.author: SALEETH L.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cage, truly keeps the floor debris free
customer_reviews.text: My mother lives in an apartment at an assisted living facility that allows pets. This cage is truly debris free. There are never seeds on the floor and anyone who has birds knows how difficult it can be to keep seeds and feathers off of the carpet. My mother can easily open the side doors to change the food and water and it is easy to clean. I'm glad someone makes this and recommend it for anyone who has a senior who might love a friend to live with them!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Snyder

customer_reviews.title: however once it’s together it’s not going to come apart easily. I like the covers over the food and ...
customer_reviews.text: This little cage is ideal for my lovebird. It’s not too big and it’s not too small. I’ll admit that putting it together was somewhat of a challenge, however once it’s together it’s not going to come apart easily. I like the covers over the food and how the food dishes are locked into place. I wish the food dish covers where a little larger to keep anything out of the dish. It’s pretty easy to clean and is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Chaalugal

customer_reviews.title: Best Cage EVER
customer_reviews.text: Honestly the easiest assembly ever and easiest to clean. I love this cage. I have one love bird, but it definitely can fit two similar sized birds. I purchased two LARGE ones for my lone Conure and I have two love birds separated from the one I keep in the smaller cage, I’m not trying to let them breed.
customer_reviews.author: EmilyRoxURsoX

customer_reviews.title: Very nice stylish cage
customer_reviews.text: Did a lot of research and read a lot of reviews on this cage. Despite reading a few reviews that the cage was a little difficult to put together, I ordered it anyway on the recommendation of my Parrotlets breeder. I'm so glad I did!! So super easy to assemble (so I don't understand the negative reviews regarding difficult assembly), all parts were accounted for and in perfect order. Plus, it's a very attractive cage that looks like it will be very funtional in cutting down the mess of scattered seed and easily cleaned. I love it and I'm sure my Parrotlet will too.
customer_reviews.author: Danae Bingaman

customer_reviews.title: Great cage for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cage! I bought it for my parakeet/budgie and he loves his new cage! My other one was a standard, small, boring cage they give you at the pet store, but this cage is SO much better! There is a lot more room, and I especially love it for the plastic bottom because now I wont have seeds and feathers all over my desk and floor. I also liked how easy it was to instal and that it came with nice big water/food dishes and perches! Great cage especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: cartoonobsessor

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean (and stays clean) intelligently configured
customer_reviews.text: After months of use, we are highly impressed with this cage design. Easy to clean (and stays clean) intelligently configured. Also liked the covers placed above the water and food trays. Clean and bright look and feel. There was sufficient space to add a couple of wood branches.Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Christina C

customer_reviews.title: Clunky, hard to assemble and clean.
customer_reviews.text: Some assembly required, and the clamps that hold it all together contribute to a clunky look. It's very heavy. How do you clean the bottom? I miss the bottom slide-out tray. And won't the clear plastic base get smeared with poo? I think I should have looked more closely before ordering. Appreciate the free return with Amazon Prime!
customer_reviews.author: sometomato

customer_reviews.title: No mess to own birdies!
customer_reviews.text: I love the hassle FREE of cleaning. You just unattach and wash all bottom everything thing u need to clean is there you can place the top part with birds on newspaper meanwhile. And the cage is so beautiful to look at to enjoy birdies. Mess cannot get out of cage!! Put it together with patience and it all makes sense! LIVE IT! I’m buying two more!
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: This cage is perfect. So well thought out with the design of ...
customer_reviews.text: This cage is perfect. So well thought out with the design of the bottom plastic mess guard. It REALLY keeps the mess out. It is on the small side though. I have 2 budgies in it and I'm soon moving them to a larger cage but this will be perfect for a travel cage. I would definitely buy another (larger) Vision cage in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Mama JNO

customer_reviews.title: Horizontal bar problem
customer_reviews.text: Very nice cage but was difficult to assemble. Also since the bars are horizontal you can’t find treat cups or self watering cups in pet stores that fit horizontal bars. Vision needs to make accessories like this.
customer_reviews.author: Lala

customer_reviews.title: Great Bird Cage
customer_reviews.text: This is a very thoughtfully designed bird cage at a reasonable price. The parakeets have a nice amount of space to climb and play. You will love that they cannot throw bird seeds out of the sides and that there are only a minimal amount of feathers that will escape. Cleaning is also quick and easy.
customer_reviews.author: McMullen

customer_reviews.title: My birds love it although I will probably go ahead and purchase ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this after a spur of the moment buying of 2 parakeets. The cages at the store were so much more expensive. Went to my amazon app and ordered it while in the pet store. My birds love it although I will probably go ahead and purchase a larger one for them.
customer_reviews.author: Jones

customer_reviews.title: Just go to the pet store.
customer_reviews.text: What I piece of CRAP! No one in my house could get it to go together. It would collapse if you bumped it and would've been unsafe for my birds. It was also smaller than I expected, but I should've read the demensions. I wouldn't recommend buying this cage or the stand. That wouldn't go together either.
customer_reviews.author: Sadi

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad, size disapointing.
customer_reviews.text: Be careful about the length and width. Measurements given are for the clear base. The cage area is much smaller. Wish I had spent a few bucks more for next larger model. Assembly was not too bad once you look very closely at the connection to the bottom. The plastic tab is between two wires.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth W.

customer_reviews.title: Best bird cage out there!
customer_reviews.text: Vision Bird cages are the best! I have two. I bought one of their largest cages for my two love birds and bought this small one for when we go on vacation, I can transport them easier to the bird-sitter. I clean their cage once a week and it is so easy. I'm telling you, don't buy another cage. This is the real deal!
customer_reviews.author: Yodelayheewho

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: The cage is beautiful easy to put together easy to clean I just bought a larger one because my bird is too big for this cage I highly recomen this cage
customer_reviews.author: Marta Galvez

customer_reviews.title: Works Great. Really keeps the area clean. Enough room for bird to enjoy.
customer_reviews.text: Keeps the dirt and seeds from flying around the house when my Parrotlets flies around the cage. Enough room for my Parrotlet to play around and enjoy. A little bit difficult to assemble at first but once assembled it's pretty sturdy and looks really clean and good all the time. I would highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: The Cow Devil

customer_reviews.title: Great design
customer_reviews.text: Who ever design this was thinking. I’ve own birds and the worse part was how the seed went everywhere. This clear area at the bottom of the cage holds the food and water bins and it keep everything inside the cage. Love it
customer_reviews.author: G girl

customer_reviews.title: Zoey loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cage to use as a travel cage for our quaker parrot "Zoey". It is a perfect size for this. We also use this cage to take him outside on the patio with us during the summer. I feel his is safe and secure in this cage outside.
customer_reviews.author: loralee robinson

customer_reviews.title: Good idea, poor design
customer_reviews.text: The doors do not work well. Any of them. The clear doors for the food and water dishes easily fall out when you open them. Mine just broke making the entire cage useless. And no bottom tray means its a pain to clean out. Its pretty but not practical at all.
customer_reviews.author: L. Zahn

customer_reviews.title: Parakeet cage
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised it came so recommended. It took me 45 minutes to put together, I can’t hang it or hang toys from the top, and so many ridges in the bottom does not makes easy clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra M. A.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t hesitate!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cage! I read the reviews and I admit I was hesitant about the assembly. Don’t hesitate, it was a piece of cake. It took all of 5 minutes. This cage looks great too. Well made and sturdy not flimsy at all. Going out to get my fine feathered friend now, a budgie. Will let you know how it works out from a birds eye view.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The cage looks nice, it's big enough and well designed enough to ...
customer_reviews.text: This is what you call a modern bird cage. Unlike its predecessors this bird cage is well designed to allow bird keeping to be as least messy as possible. The cage looks nice, it's big enough and well designed enough to adequately keep your bird happy, safe and healthy. And adequately designed enough to keep YOU happy, safe, and healthy. Also the price beats the ones that are traditional lower quality in the pet stores.
customer_reviews.author: Hildando

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Even for a small cage it’s very roomy and my parrotlet is so much happier. He can have all his toys and perches and I love how the bottom is enclosed so no mess outside the cage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have several of these
customer_reviews.text: These are great for small birds...I have my Canary in one. It keeps the stuff inside and is attractive. Lemon Drop is very happy in it. Once a week, I take the bird out and completely clean it and add new Carefresh bedding. It will seem flimsy when you are putting it together but once together it is fine. The little edge guards pop off all the time so you have to keep snapping them back on. Annoying but not a big deal. It's light and bright and a sand perch will need to be added to give them a break from the cheap plastic ones that come with the cage.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy

customer_reviews.title: best cage evaaaaaaaaa!
customer_reviews.text: I love my canaries, but they make a huge mess. This cage made bird-owning less troublesome. the bird area was kept neater thanks to the glass bottom design, which also allowed for a visual of them at all time. This was easy to set-up, and love, love, love that the pieces can be bought separately for replacement.This cage is much more delicate than the traditional, but at least you can buy the parts. The corners clicks need a serious redesign. These would never stick or always disappear. I just stopped worrying about the corners gaps after a while.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: NICE FOR SINGLE BIRD
customer_reviews.text: I purchased to separate my canaries as one has a congenital leg defect. Perfect size for ONE small bird. Easy to clean up, bowls and perches I put in DW to sanitize.
customer_reviews.author: Whytcanary

customer_reviews.title: best design
customer_reviews.text: This is the best designed cage I have ever purchased. I purchased the small version to use as a roosting/travel/emergency cage for lineolated parakeets (they are in a flight cage during the day). It is so easy to clean, that my birds enjoy a totally washed out cage each evening with no need for paper or any other chemical, VOC or dusty liner. If traveling, it keeps the mess contained and is light, easy to move. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: consumer reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Can’t go wrong with this type of cage
customer_reviews.text: Loved it I had received a rescue coupon of parakeets and was impressed so im no changing all my birdie buddies to these cages
customer_reviews.author: Jose m.

customer_reviews.title: they know cages!! They know birds 🐦
customer_reviews.text: Vision is the BEST this is my second cage and Ziggy Loves it!! @ziggy_the_budgie on IG
customer_reviews.author: Love

customer_reviews.title: Great for finches and canaries!
customer_reviews.text: Good for canaries. It's pretty easy to pop the bars out. Wouldn't recommend for anything larger than a budgy.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Love this bird cage the best ever.
customer_reviews.text: This is our third cage and we wouldn't use any other for our birds. It is so easy to clean and doesn't allow the seeds to fall out and always clean around the cage. The size and perches are perfect for our birds. Love the bird bath also (round blue) (extra purchase). An excellent cage. We have canary and finches and it is a perfect cage.
customer_reviews.author: Peacefuldove

customer_reviews.title: Great bird cage
customer_reviews.text: We found the cage easy to put together and our parrotlet is happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: BobR

customer_reviews.title: Great cage!
customer_reviews.text: Great bird cage. My parakeet is happy. The only thing I can say that is a con is it is very difficult to put together and the directions are not clear. Took some time to figure out you had to tilt the sides of the cage in ward to hook it on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble and bigger than it looks. Nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Nana T. Porter

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy and cheap...
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered two smalls and two larges... ALL of them came damaged during shipping. I know that the damage is because of rough handling. But one we actually tried to put together and it is very cheaply made and flimsy. ... which is why they were ALL damaged when shipped. I haven’t even put a bird inside.. but I would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Johnsen

customer_reviews.title: Always love Vision bird cages - and so does my canary
customer_reviews.text: Always love Vision bird cages - and so does my canary. Great design, and the only brand I will buy. I only gave it 4 stars becuse I wish there was a way to remove and clean the bottom while the bird stays safe inside. Have to remove the entire top and move it to a counter or table, while making sure the bird doesn't escape. It's easy and very quick to do, but I would still feel a little safer if the was another way.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Johansen Maher

customer_reviews.title: Bird cage
customer_reviews.text: As described and keeps the birds from making such a mess.
customer_reviews.author: ared

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for my Lovebird
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up. Clean up is extra easy. Just flip the clips and remove the base. No spills, all contained. The food and water trays are at the base and has a cover to prevent droppings. Plastic perches that comes with it gives the cage a colorful look though not the best for the bird.
customer_reviews.author: MKEM6

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and set up
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and clean. If you have a small bird like a parrotlet or parakeet it’s perfect. Any larger bird would need something larger.
customer_reviews.author: Coni Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Love this bird cage
customer_reviews.text: Love this bird cage ... water food and poop are not all over anymore. I have my two zebra finches in it.. they’re happy.
customer_reviews.author: Hojo

customer_reviews.title: Nice cage
customer_reviews.text: The cage is looking good and had more space than the other cages which are same price range. It keeps the floor clean from getting messy. My birds are still getting used to the cage. But I can see that they have started liking the cage. My only concern is I need to let the birds out every time I need to clean the cage. They could have tried to provide a tray to clean the cage bottom. So 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Raa

customer_reviews.title: Pretty sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my green cheek conure for travel and ended up using it for home as well. I have never had a cage for him with plastic elements but it is sturdy enough and holding up just fine. A great buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: corey watkins

customer_reviews.title: Poorly designed, cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap product relying on plastic pieces for assembly. Key part arrived with missing (snapped off) component. See photo. Lousy directions. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I would prefer a bigger one for the price, but this one is good for my 2 parakeets. They are happy in it, but am planning to get them a bigger one. Theres no much room for toys. A plus, is the easy way to be cleaned, you wont founs out seed on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: juanaulet

customer_reviews.title: like the instructions say it does
customer_reviews.text: I just got this cage today and it's a cute cage, but, I had a hard time putting it together , you have to put the racks on the bottom where you want them to go, then hook the bottom in. Overall it's ok, would be nice if it was a pull out bottom for easier cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: LeAnn

customer_reviews.title: This bird cage does a good job of keeping the mess minimal
customer_reviews.text: This bird cage does a good job of keeping the mess minimal. The design is nice and it is easy to see the birds. I would say it is a bit small for two younger parakeets but I feel like it is a good fit for my older ones.
customer_reviews.author: Mamabear

customer_reviews.title: Plastic is not good quality can easily break
customer_reviews.text: Cage is hard to put together, does not take 10 min as instructions state. Plastic is not good quality can easily break. Needs a carrying handle. To clean you have to take the entire bottom off, so better take the birds out first, not good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: just love this  cage
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money..keeps area around the cage much cleaner, so easy to get access to clean water etc. great features inside..only slight drawback is that to clean the cage bottom it is tricky to handle the birds to not get out would have been nice to have bottom tray slide out but then again..the two snaps are so quick you can clean the bottom quickly and place the top on a surface so you dont have to tansfer birds to another place.. I'd buy this in a larger size for my two bigger doves i just love it.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Dorazio

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Ive bought a total of 4 of these on this exact listing on amazon, perfect for my vision bird cage and easy to manage and deal with compared to wood nests.
customer_reviews.author: King Kolt

customer_reviews.title: Didn't like it
customer_reviews.text: Didn't like it. Not easy to clean, you can't hung it. I returned it and bought a more wire traditional that had a removable tray for daily cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: sol

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Came on time in great condition. All pieces in the box. Awesome cage!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love love love my vision cages
customer_reviews.text: This is he second vision cage i have purchased. Food mess around the cage is almost non exisitant. I will be buying more vision cages in the future
customer_reviews.author: OneNuttyMama

customer_reviews.title: I adopted a bird from a family member who could ...
customer_reviews.text: I adopted a bird from a family member who could no longer take care of him, and this cage is a little bigger than the cage he came in. Id say its a little small for a budgie, but the size has made it a little easier to hand tame him, and soon he can come out and fly around the room when he needs exercise.
customer_reviews.author: Aisling

customer_reviews.title: Vision Cages Are Super!
customer_reviews.text: I love this for my parrotlet. I use this as his going out of town for the weekend cage. I feel it's too small for being in all the time. I have the largest one for being in during the day. These are well made, easy to put together though a bit fiddly. It doesn't require any tools and they look really nice. Vision cages are really easy to clean. I love that part.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Webster

customer_reviews.title: Great cage. Using it to travel with my sun ...
customer_reviews.text: Great cage. Using it to travel with my sun conure. However, it's hard for her to climb up from the food bowls on the bottom since there is no wire on the bottom 4ish inches. Luckily she's bug enough to barely make it up. But I can't imagine a smaller bird climbing up from the bottom
customer_reviews.author: Brittani

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cage, I've had birds my whole life and this is the only cage I've had that keeps the mess in, I don't have to constantly clean the whole area around the cage. The cage itself is nice and roomy ( I have 2 small birds in it) it's very easy to clean and can break down almost flat if you need to store or ship it.
customer_reviews.author: Hijack Katanga

customer_reviews.title: I'm familiar with the vision cages all sizes take 10 ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm familiar with the vision cages all sizes take 10 min to put the small together. 25 minutes for the medium.
customer_reviews.author: A-Z

customer_reviews.title: Gouldian Finch Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: Was fairly easy to set up (for my husband, that is, and the bird took about 5 minutes to figure out where she was and started flying around looking out of the clear part, then the bar part and back and forth.
customer_reviews.author: Jean M. Morrissey

customer_reviews.title: No sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Have to be so careful with this Cage holds together only with a few clips
customer_reviews.author: Twistii

customer_reviews.title: No mess - Love it
customer_reviews.text: No mess after now 5 days of use. My cockatiel seems to like it too.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Fairly simple to assemble, the guide is primarily pictures rather than words. As long as you can follow along, easy peasy. Cleaning the cage is easy, as the solid clear base keeps water, feathers and seed shells inside. The covers over the food and water dish are also a big plus, as it keeps them clean.
customer_reviews.author: Robert N.

customer_reviews.title: My finches love it. But they don’t when they escape from ...
customer_reviews.text: My finches love it. But they don’t when they escape from top wire panel, it falls and they hate me catching them.
customer_reviews.author: carlos vega

customer_reviews.title: Great cages. Travel well.
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased these for years. I wouldn’t buy any other cage for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: Easy side access to feed/water dishes
customer_reviews.text: Beautful cage. Easy side access to feed/water dishes, with protective guards above to keep feeding areas clean. The bottom of the cage lifts out nicely for easy cleaning. Very user friendly. My two budgies love their little home!
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy used.
customer_reviews.text: Used item came without the top cover . Will be returning. And plastic was heavily scratched . Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Best investment
customer_reviews.text: It might be a smaller model but my two budgies fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Aguirre

customer_reviews.title: Well designed cage
customer_reviews.text: We have a parakeet in this cage and it's great for him. Love the design. A bird person definitely made this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bird cage! Super roomy and easy to clean. I love the clear plastic at the bottom of the sides on the cage because it keeps all the seeds and trash inside the cage. Highly recommend if you have 1 or 2 parakeets.
customer_reviews.author: malto

customer_reviews.title: No mess at all!! Awesome cage!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome cage!! If you don't like to clean seeds off your floor everyday then this is the cage you will want. I have n mess on my floor. I'm disabled and can't clean seeds everyday, this cage allowed me to keep my birds. I have two no mess cages. This one with two parakeets and a much larger one with a family of finches. I love both of my cages!!
customer_reviews.author: Ted Johnson

customer_reviews.title: BEST CAGE EVER
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely built! The creators thought of of every thing. Food guards, easy to assemble and clean. It is stylish looking and Buttercup loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Terry L. Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great price and very functional cage.
customer_reviews.text: we have a parakeet (budgie). Plenty of room for her. We did end up buying a ladder for her to get to her food and water as that seemed to be an issue according to my daughter. Well made and great price.
customer_reviews.author: juliejules

customer_reviews.title: My birds love this cage!!!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this cage! Really decent sized cage for those who don't have a lot of space. The cover for the food works wonders for keeping bird droppings out of the seeds. The food/water guard works wonders in keeping the food from getting all over the place. & lastly it was so easy putting the cage together. Great product! 5 thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: excellent. easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: excellent. easy to assemble. Birds' dirt is all trapped inside the cage it's best for owner to keep their home tidy. One thing need to beware is, in order to keep empty seed inside the cage, the lower skirting is made of acrylic so infant bird finds a bit difficult to climb up. it's better to offer a little ladder to solve the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Jesskalem

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Bird Cage
customer_reviews.text: Okay bird lovers or newbies. This is the cage for you. Someone put a lot of thought into designing this product. The feeders come out easy making washing a breeze! Easy to put together. The sides stop all of the scattering of seed. I am very impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Theda

customer_reviews.title: ... cage followed instructions and parts still don't fit lol good cage though but cleaning the bottom u have to ...
customer_reviews.text: okay so I got the cage followed instructions and parts still don't fit lol good cage though but cleaning the bottom u have to completely take cage apart
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful cage.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cage. Easy clean up, lots of room and the food shields work the way they should. I purchased the stand as well. The stand is not quite my style but the cage sits on it nicely. I have parrotlets in my cage.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

product_meta.title: Vision Hagen 2 Bird Cage
product_meta.description: Size:SmallThe Vision Small Bird Cage #S01 is a suitable cage for budgies, canaries, lovebirds and finches. It provides your bird with lots of room to move around and Vision makes it easy for you to take care of your bird. Bird movements cause air currents, which flow outwards, and in the case of most standard bird cages these air currents eject waste and seed debris outside of the cage and onto the floor. With Vision Cages, the combination of the debris guard, the deep base and the placement of the seed/water cups helps combat air currents to keep the majority of the waste and debris inside the cage. This reduces the amount of mess and time-consuming clean ups, leaving you more time to enjoy your pet. The Vision Small Bird Cage is a great home for your new bird. Dimensions : Horizontal wire :0.06 inch, Vertical wire : 0.10 inch, Wire spacing (center to center) : 0.48 inch
feature_bullets: Small wire bird cage for budgies, canaries, lovebirds and finches
Cage detaches from base for fast, easy cleaning
Debris guard helps keep waste inside cage
Single height; Equipped with green perches and food/water dishes
15 inches long x 19 inches wide x 20 inches high

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
